entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 15 except minus 10 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Low minus 15 except minus 10 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 11 February 2023
